meanings.definition: A subatomic particle having the same mass as a corresponding particle but opposite electric charge.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study antiparticles to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The concept of antiparticles plays a crucial role in particle physics.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, the antiparticles decided to have a charge-swapping contest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of particle physics, antiparticles are like mirror images of regular particles.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of antiparticles revolutionized our understanding of the subatomic world.

meanings.definition: A particle having the same spin, magnetic moment, and rest mass as a corresponding particle but opposite charge.
meanings.sent1: The existence of antiparticles was predicted by theoretical physicists.
meanings.sent2: Antiparticles can annihilate with their corresponding particles upon collision.
meanings.sent3: During the costume party, the antiparticles dressed up as their particle counterparts.
meanings.sent4: The interaction between particles and antiparticles is a fascinating area of study.
meanings.sent5: The symmetrical nature of antiparticles adds complexity to the field of particle physics.
